title: The Hot Housing Market with Cortland's Brad Dillman
itunes:title: The Hot Housing Market with Cortland's Brad Dillman
description:
Brad Dillman, Chief Economist at Cortland, discusses the 2022 housing outlook, Amanda Victoria, Co-Founder and CEO of Siponey, discusses premium canned cocktails, Brad Stone, Bloomberg News Executive Editor of Global Tech discusses Shopify, and we drive to the close with David Dietze, Senior Portfolio Strategist at Peapack Private Wealth Management. Hosted by Tim Stenovec and Kriti Gupta.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
